options.name: Action : Cheapshot
options.description: Make an Unarmed Attack with a 1d4 Bonus to the Attack and Damage. If the Attack hits, the Creature moves to the bottom of the Iniative order. If this ability is used to initiate Combat or on the first round, the Creature also loses their first Action.

options.name: Reaction : Dirty Fighting
options.description: In response to an Ally making an Attack on a Creature that is Adjacent to you, make an Attack on that same Creature with a Light Melee Weapon or Unarmed Attack with a 1d4 Bonus Modifier.

options.name: Hidden Weapon
options.description: You can conceal either an Ultra Light Ranged or 1 Handed Light Weapon which can only be discovered by a Search Check of 12 or higher. Your first Attack with this Weapon in Combat gains a +2 Attack Modifier and is an automatic True Hit if it hits.

options.name: Action : Knife Trick
options.description: You throw a Light 1 Handed Melee Weapon at a Target within 3 units and immediately move Adjacent to that Creature without provoking Reactions. If your Attack hits, make an additional Melee Attack with the same Weapon with a -2 Attack Modifier.
